channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Jailed U.S. reporter's Russian trial begins. A strange monolith appears near Las Vegas
item.description: U.S. journalist Evan Gershkovich is on trial for espionage in Russia. A mysterious metallic monolith appeared in Las Vegas this month.
item.content:encoded:
U.S. journalist Evan Gershkovich is on trial for espionage in Russia. A mysterious metallic monolith appeared in Las Vegas this month.

(Image credit: Brian Inganga)
item.dc:creator: Majd Al-Waheidi

item.title: Assange arrives in Australia after pleading guilty to espionage on the way home
item.description: The WikiLeaks founder pleaded guilty to one count of violating espionage laws in a U.S. court in the Northern Mariana Islands, where the judge sentenced him to time served for his lengthy prison stay.
item.content:encoded:
The WikiLeaks founder pleaded guilty to one count of violating espionage laws in a U.S. court in the Northern Mariana Islands, where the judge sentenced him to time served for his lengthy prison stay.

(Image credit: Rick Rycroft)
item.dc:creator: Adam Hancock

item.title: Border arrests fall more than 40% since Biden's halt to asylum processing
item.description: Homeland Security says border arrests are falling to January 2021 averages
item.content:encoded:
Homeland Security says border arrests are falling to January 2021 averages

(Image credit: VCG/VCG via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Associated Press

item.title: Followers of Iris the osprey celebrate her chicks hatching
item.description: Iris, whose webcam has 20,000+ followers, has hatched chicks for the first time in five years. She's one of the worlds oldest known osprey, age 28, despite feeding from a giant superfund site.
item.content:encoded: Iris, whose webcam has 20,000+ followers, has hatched chicks for the first time in five years. She's one of the worlds oldest known osprey, age 28, despite feeding from a giant superfund site.
item.dc:creator: Austin Amestoy

item.title: What did WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange change by releasing classified documents?
item.description: NPR's A Martinez asks Alan Rusbridger, former editor-in-chief of The Guardian, about the legacy of Julian Assange, and the 2010 WikiLeaks publication of classified government information.
item.content:encoded: NPR's A Martinez asks Alan Rusbridger, former editor-in-chief of The Guardian, about the legacy of Julian Assange, and the 2010 WikiLeaks publication of classified government information.
item.dc:creator: A Mart√≠nez

item.title: Stuck in a rut? How to appreciate your life again, according to science
item.description: After a while, even the most exciting relationships, jobs and environments lose their spark. But cognitive neuroscientist Tali Sharot says it's possible to fall back in love with life's small joys.
item.content:encoded:
After a while, even the most exciting relationships, jobs and environments lose their spark. But cognitive neuroscientist Tali Sharot says it's possible to fall back in love with life's small joys.

(Image credit: Malte Mueller)
item.dc:creator: Andrew Limbong

item.title: These nurse managers were burnt out. Then their hospital gave them a 4-day workweek
item.description: Since the pandemic, hospitals have seen soaring turnover among clinical managers who oversee teams of nurses. Now some hospitals, including AtlantiCare in New Jersey, have introduced a four-day workweek.
item.content:encoded:
Since the pandemic, hospitals have seen soaring turnover among clinical managers who oversee teams of nurses. Now some hospitals, including AtlantiCare in New Jersey, have introduced a four-day workweek.

(Image credit: Andrea Hsu)
item.dc:creator: Andrea Hsu

item.title: Biden has taken more action on climate than any president. His pitch? It creates jobs
item.description: Climate change has been a central focus in Joe Biden's first term. But fossil fuels have also flourished, and meeting the country's climate goals would require even bigger steps in a second term.
item.content:encoded:
Climate change has been a central focus in Joe Biden's first term. But fossil fuels have also flourished, and meeting the country's climate goals would require even bigger steps in a second term.

(Image credit: Manuel Balce Ceneta)
item.dc:creator: Jeff Brady

item.title: Another monolith appeared near Las Vegas. Who's behind these mysterious objects?
item.description: Metallic prisms have been appearing across the world since one was found in Utah in 2020, but in many cases it‚Äôs still unclear who created them and why.
item.content:encoded:
Metallic prisms have been appearing across the world since one was found in Utah in 2020, but in many cases it‚Äôs still unclear who created them and why.

(Image credit: Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department)
item.dc:creator: Joe Hernandez

item.title: Chorus or cacophony? Cicada song hits some ears harder than others
item.description: Cicadas are the song of the summer, but this year‚Äôs large broods may be especially irritating for people on the autism spectrum who have hearing sensitivity.
item.content:encoded:
Cicadas are the song of the summer, but this year‚Äôs large broods may be especially irritating for people on the autism spectrum who have hearing sensitivity.

(Image credit: Zach Dyer)
